Description: A universal API to access identity data, balance and transactions from your users’ bank account. Connect with multiple institutions, save months of development and stay compliant.
Name: TrueLayer

Methods.Name: List all accounts
Methods.Description: Returns all customer accounts and associated data

Methods.Name: Retrieve an account
Methods.Description: Returns data associated with the specified account

Methods.Name: Retrieve account balance
Methods.Description: Returns balance information for the specified account

Methods.Name: Retrieve account transactions
Methods.Description: Returns transaction data for the specified account

Methods.Name: List all cards
Methods.Description: Returns all customer cards and associated data

Methods.Name: Retrieve a card
Methods.Description: Returns a customer card and associated data

Methods.Name: Retrieve card balance
Methods.Description: Returns card balance information for the specified account

Methods.Name: Retrieve card transactions
Methods.Description: Returns card transaction data for the specified account

Methods.Name: Retrieve identity information
Methods.Description: Returns Customer identity information held by the Provider. This can include name, address, emails and phone numbers
